Definition: Da Capo al Coda (“from the beginning to the Coda sign”)
Da Capo al Fine (“from the beginning to the end”)
Dal Segno al Fine (“from the Segno mark to the end”)
Spiccato (“bounce bow on a stringed instrument”)
Staccato (“playing each note separately from the others”)
Sul Ponticello (“playing with the bow near the bridge”)
